trait.name: Great Weapon Master
entries: On your turn, when you score a critical hit with a melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 hit points with one, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action.
Before you make a melee attack with a heavy weapon that you are proficient with, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you add +10 to the attack's damage.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: You have 3 luck points. Whenever you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can spend one luck point to roll an additional {@dice d20}. You can choose to spend one of your luck points after you roll the die, but before the outcome is determined. You choose which of the d20s is used for the attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

You can also spend one luck point when an attack roll is made against you. Roll a {@dice d20}, and then choose whether the attack uses the attacker's roll or yours. If more than one creature spends a luck point to influence the outcome of a roll, the points cancel each other out; no additional dice are rolled.
You regain your expended luck points when you finish a long rest.

trait.name: Action Surge
entries: On your turn, you can take one additional action.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

trait.name: Maneuvers
entries: Five {@dice d10|d10|Superiority Dice} Superiority Dice, Maneuver {@dc 18}
{@optfeature Brace|TCE}, {@optfeature Disarming Attack}, {@optfeature Lunging Attack}, {@optfeature Menacing Attack}, {@optfeature Precision Attack}, {@optfeature Riposte}, {@optfeature Trip Attack}

trait.name: Indomitable
entries: You can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll, and you can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

trait.name: Ki
entries: 5 {@dice d6|d6|Martial Arts Dice} Martial Arts Dice

bonus.name: Second Wind
entries: Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

bonus.name: Flurry of Blows
entries: Immediately after you take the Attack action on your turn, you can spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes as a bonus action.
{@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Extra Attack
entries: You can attack three times whenever you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn.

action.name: {@item Shortsword|phb}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.
